channel.title: Server Announcement Command
channel.description: Does anyone have a Server Announcement Command or something similar to that?

item.title: Server Announcement Command
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

i’ll make one for you. But, if you used your common sense, you could make one your own out of the ::yell command…

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“announce”) && command.length() > 8)
{

command.substring(8).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(8).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(8).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot announce!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - [ANNOUNCEMENT]" +command.substring(8);
}[/code]

Read full topic
